caption: A boy woke up in terror from a dream, finding an old man at the foot of his bed. He rushed out to confide in another elderly man, who appeared to be his elder. The elder patiently explained things to him, and the boy's emotions gradually stabilized.Meanwhile, on a beach, two warriors engaged in combat, wielding swords as they attacked each other. A crowd had gathered to watch, with one woman enthusiastically cheering them on. The scene was quite lively. Then, another woman approached, and the sleazy man said something to her.
